pci_projects_project_storages_snapshots_: You have not yet taken a volume snapshot.
Take a snapshot of your Block Storage volumes.

Volume snapshots are instant images of Block Storage volumes. They allow you to revert, generating new versions from a saved point. This method retrieves your previously requested data or information.
Volume snapshots are stored in the same place as the volume it is taken from, and is also triple-replicated.
To take a volume snapshot, you need to have created at least one volume.
Transfer a volume backup from one datacentre to another
Find out how to transfer a volume backup from one datacentre to another
